Invocation Name: transit tracker
des:
Transit Tracker is your ultimate Alexa skill for seamless public transportation navigation in New Jersey, powered by Transit. Perfect for daily commutes or spontaneous trips, Transit Tracker helps you stay on top of your transit schedule by providing real-time updates for nearby bus and train stops.

To get started, simply ask Alexa to 'Search for stops near me.' The skill will locate and present nearby transit options based on your current location in New Jersey. Once you’ve found a stop, you can choose it to receive up-to-date information on the next bus or train arriving. No need to worry if there are no stops near you as Transit Tracker enables you to search stop by it's code.

For added convenience, you can set a default stop by saying 'Set stop number X as default.' This allows you to quickly access arrival times for your most frequently used stop without needing to search each time.

Additionally, you can use the command 'Check my stop' to get real-time updates on the next arrivals for your default stop, ensuring you’re always informed and ready for your ride.

Please note, to deliver accurate and relevant transit information, Transit Tracker requires permission to access your Amazon Echo's address. This enables the skill to provide location-based transit updates tailored to your specific area in New Jersey.

With Transit Tracker, you’ll have a reliable companion for all your transit needs in New Jersey, making your travel experience smoother and more predictable. Say goodbye to missed buses and trains, and enjoy a stress-free journey with Transit Tracker, powered by Transit!

If you have any issues or feedback, please contact me at transittrackerr@gmail.com.
